clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in left upper lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Pleural effusion on the left upper lobe side, moderate in size.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left upper lobe.
Well-defined nodule measuring 22 mm in left upper lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left upper lobe.
